Topic.Title: Giant Fortress Academy text based game

Posts.EditableText: If anybody has any ideas on how to expand this please let me know. This is my first text based game, although not my first game i've made this will be the first non-flash one and downloadable one, i guess. If anybody has ideas on characters, rooms, objects, goals, or even just how to add story to it or create it I'd gladly appreciate it.
